summary: Completed comprehensive testing of SkillTree MVP. Backend APIs mostly functional (90.5% success rate) with 2 critical issues. Frontend UI loads correctly but has major integration problems due to CORS/URL configuration issues.

critical_bugs.issue: Returns 500 Internal Server Error due to MongoDB ObjectId serialization issue
critical_bugs.impact: Blocks core skill learning flow - users cannot start skills
critical_bugs.error_details: ValueError: [TypeError("'ObjectId' object is not iterable"), TypeError('vars() argument must have __dict__ attribute')]

performance_issues.issue: AI content generation times out after 10 seconds
performance_issues.impact: Users cannot generate AI-enhanced lesson content
performance_issues.note: API actually succeeds (200 OK) but takes longer than client timeout

critical_bugs.issue: Frontend making API calls to wrong backend URL causing CORS errors
critical_bugs.impact: All skill-related actions fail - core functionality broken
critical_bugs.error_details: XMLHttpRequest blocked by CORS policy - calling 'https://oneshot-run.preview.emergentagent.com' instead of correct backend URL

ui_bugs.issue: Integration cards not displaying with correct data-testid attributes
ui_bugs.impact: Integration connection buttons not accessible via expected selectors

passed_tests: Dashboard stats display (XP, level, completion rate, skills count)

critical_fixes_required: Fix MongoDB ObjectId serialization issue in /api/user-skills/{skill_id}/start endpoint
Fix frontend API URL configuration - currently calling wrong backend URL causing CORS errors
Update integration page data-testid attributes for proper testing
medium_priority: Increase timeout for AI content generation or implement async handling
Verify all skill-related API endpoints work after ObjectId fix
action_item_for_main_agent.note: The core skill learning flow is completely broken due to backend serialization error and frontend URL misconfiguration. These must be fixed before the app is functional for users.

success_percentage.frontend: 60% (UI loads correctly, auth works, but core skill functionality broken)
